scripts.generate: yarn clean && mkdir -p lib/ && find ../protos/ -name "*.proto" | xargs yarn grpc_tools_node_protoc --plugin=protoc-gen-ts="scripts/protoc-gen-ts.sh" -I../protos/ --js_out=import_style=commonjs_strict,binary:lib/ --grpc_out=grpc_js:lib/ --ts_out=service=grpc-node,mode=grpc-js:lib/ && yarn node scripts/generate-entry.mjs
